pages.text: $(bred)Balloon Zombie$() is very lucky to get the balloon, which help it float above the fray.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)23$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : Its fly speed is $(l)Fast$(). most of plants $(bred)can't target it when it's flying$().$(br)$(bpurple)Weakness$() : $(bgreen)Cactus$(), $(bgreen)Blover$()...
